formalpara.title: Figure 2.
formalpara.para: Examples of smFISH staining from embryos and L1 larvae. A. Detection of elt-2 mRNA (cyan spots) in mixed stage embryos. Scale bar is 5 μm long. (Adapted from Raj et al. 2010) B. Detection of three Wnt ligands, cwn-1, egl-20 and lin-44, in the posterior body of staged L1 larvae. Scale bar is 10 μm long. (Adapted from Harterink et al. 2011).
